metadata.name: PowerShell Module File Created By Non-PowerShell Process
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new PowerShell module ".psm1", ".psd1", ".dll", ".ps1", etc. by a non-PowerShell process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\windowspowershell\\modules\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\powershell\\7\\modules\\'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\powershell\\7-preview\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\powershell\\7\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\poqexec.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell_ise.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\poqexec.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell_ise.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new PowerShell module ".psm1", ".psd1", ".dll", ".ps1", etc. by a non-PowerShell process

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: Internal Research, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/developer/module/understanding-a-windows-powershell-module?view=powershell-7.3
